help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes
description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role

any.message: ARIA attributes are used correctly for the defined role

help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element
description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element

any.message: ARIA role is allowed for given element

help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body
description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.

any.message: No aria-hidden attribute is present on document body

help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided
description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes

any.message: All required ARIA attributes are present

help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values
description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value

help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values
description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values

all.message: aria-errormessage exists and references elements visible to screen readers that use a supported aria-errormessage technique

help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names
description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes

any.message: ARIA attribute name is valid

help: Buttons must have discernible text
description: Ensures buttons have discernible text

any.message: Element has inner text that is visible to screen readers
aria-label attribute exists and is not empty

help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast
description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 9.43

help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation
description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element

any.message: Document has a non-empty <title> element

help: IDs of active elements must be unique
description: Ensures every id attribute value of active elements is unique

any.message: Document has no active elements that share the same id attribute

help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique
description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique

any.message: Document has no elements referenced with ARIA or labels that share the same id attribute

help: id attribute value must be unique
description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique

any.message: Document has no static elements that share the same id attribute

help: Headings should not be empty
description: Ensures headings have discernible text

any.message: Element has text that is visible to screen readers

help: Form field must not have multiple label elements
description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements

none.message: Form field does not have multiple label elements

help: Heading levels should only increase by one
description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

any.message: Heading order valid

help: Hidden content on the page cannot be analyzed
description: Informs users about hidden content.

any.message: All content on the page has been analyzed.

help: <html> element must have a lang attribute
description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute

any.message: The <html> element has a lang attribute

help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute
description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value

none.message: Value of lang attribute is included in the list of valid languages

help: Elements must have their visible text as part of their accessible name
description: Ensures that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

any.message: Element contains visible text as part of it's accessible name

help: Form elements should have a visible label
description: Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes

none.message: Form element does not solely use title attribute for its label

help: Form elements must have labels
description: Ensures every form element has a label

any.message: Form element has an explicit <label>

none.message: Form element has a visible explicit <label>

help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark
description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level

nodes.html: Exam project

any.message: The banner landmark is at the top level.

help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark
description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level

any.message: The contentinfo landmark is at the top level.

help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark
description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level

any.message: The main landmark is at the top level.
The main landmark is at the top level.

help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark
description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark

nodes.html: Exam project

any.message: Document does not have more than one banner landmark

help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark
description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark

any.message: Document does not have more than one contentinfo landmark

help: Document should not have more than one main landmark
description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark

any.message: Document does not have more than one main landmark
Document does not have more than one main landmark

help: Document should have one main landmark
description: Ensures the document has a main landmark

all.message: Document has at least one main landmark

help: Ensures landmarks are unique
description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.html: Exam project

any.message: Landmarks must have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%
description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount

any.message: <meta> tag does not prevent significant zooming on mobile devices

help: Zooming and scaling should not be disabled
description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming

any.message: <meta> tag does not disable zooming on mobile devices

help: Ensure interactive controls are not nested
description: Nested interactive controls are not announced by screen readers

any.message: Element does not have focusable descendants

help: Page should contain a level-one heading
description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading

all.message: Page has at least one level-one heading

help: All page content should be contained by landmarks
description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

help: CSS Media queries are not used to lock display orientation
description: Ensures content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations

all.message: Display is operable, and orientation lock does not exist

help: scope attribute should be used correctly
description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables

nodes.html: Numero

all.message: Scope attribute is only used on table header elements (<th>)

help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero
description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0

any.message: Element does not have a tabindex greater than 0

help: The <caption> element should not contain the same text as the summary attribute
description: Ensure that tables do not have the same summary and caption

none.message: Content of summary attribute and <caption> are not duplicated

help: Data or header cells must not be used to give caption to a data table.
description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element.

all.message: The first row of a table is not used as a caption

help: All non-empty td element in table larger than 3 by 3 must have an associated table header
description: Ensure that each non-empty data cell in a large table has one or more table headers

all.message: All non-empty data cells have table headers

help: All cells in a table element that use the headers attribute must only refer to other cells of that same table
description: Ensure that each cell in a table using the headers refers to another cell in that table

all.message: The headers attribute is exclusively used to refer to other cells in the table

help: All th elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader must have data cells they describe
description: Ensure that each table header in a data table refers to data cells

all.message: All table header cells refer to data cells
